channel.title: Rune-Rape 317 - [ Clean Please ]
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]..™Rune-Rape™.. [/size] Feel the diffrence, Beta Started. [email]imlinkan@live.se[/email]
[hr]
Because evryone was complaining about that I acually gave credits. Ill remove it all and put me and my friend on the list.
If you call me a leecher now, or say "[i]OMGFZZ I SAW THATH ON THIZ ONTH3R S3RVER d00D![/i]" I will[b] Simply [/b]ignore you, Cause I acually gave credits, but evryone told me that I should'nt credit people.. ok then. [b] Credits: [/b]
Linus(Me) Alex H
[b]Coders:[/b] Linus (gon3d34d123 @mpr) [b]Hoster:[/b] Linus (gon3d34d123 @mpr) [b]Owner:[/b] Alex H (Unknown @mpr)
[hr]
[b]Things left to do:[/b]
[ul][li]Fix Special attacks[/li] [li]Add music to client[/li] [li]Learn more about Npc vs Npc[/li] [li]Fix Pest Control[/li][/ul]
[b]tzTok-Jad Minigame to get firecape[/b] ([i]60% Credits to Delta_, JaydenD12[/i]) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Td4tS7Xaxo]TzHaar Minigame Video[/url] [b] Teleport Npc[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZrW3LkSkS8]Hans, The teleporter Video[/url]
[b]My progress in Pest Control[/b] ([i]99% Credits to Delta[/i]) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3m-R_6XmOkg]Pest Control Minigame Video[/url]
[b]My progress in Barrows[/b] ([i]So far 80% credits to Jayden[/i]) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uxfQXfx5O_Y]Barrows Minigame Video[/url]
[b]My progress in Agility[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gr4eWBneueo]Agility Feature Video[/url]
[b]My progress in Fishing[/b] ([i]there's still some glitches like still wielding weapons and shields[/i]) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9vTR_dv72dw]The Fishing Feature Video[/url]
[b]The Current Pk Feature[/b] ([i]Not done coding the timers[/i]) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QU6a9bxCrYI]The Pk Feature Video[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WCmtQWpwno8]Ags Rush Video[/url] ([i]Whit 100% finished timers[/i]) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dM5TYID6XOM&feature=related]Pk[/url] ([i]Just for fun whit some guys on the server[/i])
[/center]

item.title: Rune-Rape 317 - [ Clean Please ]
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

Okay, listen.

I had a credit list. In both my client folder, And my source folder, I added the names cause I don’t want people saying “Ah I saw this in “blablabla”'s post to, leecher”

I atleast give people credit.

And when I think about it, the server’s witch do not give credits are just leeches.
Cause they’r taken from alot of diffrent servers.

The pest control:

I am working on it, and no, it’s not 100% delta. Cause I made that if you use full Void Knight armour you hit higher on portals.
I made them heal it’self when they get 10% hp below.

Im trying to find the pest control npc’s and i’ve posted a topic in the help section for npc’ on npc.

README_1.txt

That one included in my client.

Read full topic

I still got my other server, I wont delete it just cause I’ve found a new source.

Wow...

So you add the three things that makes a server fail.

Aloins or what evers cache, ITS NOT HD DUMBASS

Dragon claws, You now are on 50% fail

How does that tell me that the server was good?
Think about what you write to others dickhead.

item.title: Rune-Rape 317 - [ Clean Please ]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Zh, post:22, topic:285650”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=377772.msg2864149#msg2864149 date=1247351850]
Looks cool, I’ll pm you some tuts if you’d like, going more into NPC drops (such as dropping bones 100% and then another random item).
Maybe you could make a tut about quests? Because im struggling with them.

But yeah, it looks very good. The only thing I was concerned about was the prices. Are those the prices in shops? And if yes, then you shouldn’t really have those good items in shops. If no, are those gonna be the street prices when the server comes out?

Sucks about RS though. My first account got banned when I was swearing at people at cw, and I thought one report = BAN HAMMER. But lots of people said “reported!” to me, and I didn’t get banned so I’m like “HAHA you can’t BAN ME!!!”. I thought that banning was a rumor but I guess it wasnt :P. So yeah, I was swearing at people at cw ALL THE TIME. Everytime we were losing, I was like “Stupid asssholes go die!”
Ass with 3 S’s wasn’t blocked then, so yeah…

So then when I got banned, it said my account has been “disabled”. I thought this was a bug. I told my mom and shes like “IDK.” I was sitting there for 3 hours and I didn’t figure anything out. Then I thought “Oh shit maybe im banned?” My friend told me its easy as hell to get back a banned account, so I was like “Yeah, there’s probably a form you have to fill out”.

Turns out my account was PERMANENTLY BANNED. I was like “WTF!!! WHY!”

So 2 or 3 years later (that was 2008) I try to recover him and I actually get him unbanned. Im like “Wtf… I thought I was perm?” But no, I logged on and it was like 800 days later. I shit my pants at that sight. But he’s still perm mute.

[/quote]

Lol nice story. 800 days later! LIAR!!! thats like 2 almost 3 years.[/quote]

Yeah. 2 and 3 quarters. What’s wrong with that

Read full topic

@pk3r_john wrote:

Looks cool, I’ll pm you some tuts if you’d like, going more into NPC drops (such as dropping bones 100% and then another random item).
Maybe you could make a tut about quests? Because im struggling with them.

But yeah, it looks very good. The only thing I was concerned about was the prices. Are those the prices in shops? And if yes, then you shouldn’t really have those good items in shops. If no, are those gonna be the street prices when the server comes out?

Sucks about RS though. My first account got banned when I was swearing at people at cw, and I thought one report = BAN HAMMER. But lots of people said “reported!” to me, and I didn’t get banned so I’m like “HAHA you can’t BAN ME!!!”. I thought that banning was a rumor but I guess it wasnt :P. So yeah, I was swearing at people at cw ALL THE TIME. Everytime we were losing, I was like “Stupid asssholes go die!”
Ass with 3 S’s wasn’t blocked then, so yeah…

So then when I got banned, it said my account has been “disabled”. I thought this was a bug. I told my mom and shes like “IDK.” I was sitting there for 3 hours and I didn’t figure anything out. Then I thought “Oh shit maybe im banned?” My friend told me its easy as hell to get back a banned account, so I was like “Yeah, there’s probably a form you have to fill out”.

Turns out my account was PERMANENTLY BANNED. I was like “WTF!!! WHY!”

So 2 or 3 years later (that was 2008) I try to recover him and I actually get him unbanned. Im like “Wtf… I thought I was perm?” But no, I logged on and it was like 800 days later. I shit my pants at that sight. But he’s still perm mute.
